topic: The Awakening of Dormant Limbs (Touch & Warp)

analysis.input_vector: Captain requested System Scan and Activation of unfinished projects.
analysis.output_vector: Identified 'Static Archive' and 'Passive Vision' as defects. Patched 'CrystalField' with pointer events and 'MandalaVisualizer' with double-click override.
analysis.key_insight: A cockpit is only real if the buttons click. The Archive is now a touch-screen.

crystallization_result.axiom_injected: Haptics: Memory must have texture. Power must have a trigger.
